程序包 subSystems

类 CovidBAndTSystem

java.lang.Object
subSystems.CovidBAndTSystem
直接已知子类:
HomeBookingSubsystem, LoginSubsystem, OnsiteBookingSubsystem, OnsiteTestingSubsystem, SearchForSitesSubsystem
public abstract class CovidBAndTSystem extends Object
Abstract class for Subsystems functions are control the whole subsystem running and the actions and menu displaying
